Synonyms.Synonym: Cancer of the esophagus - esophagectomy - open

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Esophagectomy - open
QAPair.Answer: Open esophagectomy is surgery to remove part or all of the esophagus. This is the tube that moves food from your throat to your stomach. After it is removed, the esophagus is rebuilt from part of your stomach or part of your large intestine. Most of the time, esophagectomy is done to treat cancer of the esophagus or a severely damaged esophagus.
